description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Shoot & knife your way through endless levels of zombies and rescue as many survivors as you can.  Get money for each zombie kill and for each survivor saved.  Get as much money as you can since reloading is expensive.  Get pickup items to boost your power, but be warned, the zombies get stronger also.  First Person Zombie Killing Action.
